name: Musical Boss Battles
description:
Info

This game was made in less than 48 hours for the Mini Jam 107: Music².

In this game you fight powerful bosses using the power of controlling gravity to combine instruments and produce a variety of effects.

For the best experience play in fullscreen or download the game.

Controls

A,S,D,W - Movement

F - Dash

SPACE - Melee attack

Left click - Select instrument (drag it on another instrument of same type to produce an effect)

Effects

Guitar - Spawns projectile that attacks the boss

Trumpet - Get 2 melee attack charges

Flute - Get 2 dash charges
